aboutpara:
Finishing a course in Computer Engineering at UFC with knowledge mainly in Front End and web
development using the React ecosystem technologies, I've already worked in a startup, an internship
and in a multinational company even before I graduated, I learned to solve problems in a practical
way even being very young. I am looking for opportunities to apply my knowledge, learn and
aggregate with my expertise
